features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete user authentication with JWT, OAuth (Google & GitHub), password reset, and session management

features.name: Resume Upload & Parsing
features.description: Upload PDF/DOCX resumes, extract text using AI, and parse into structured data with Gemini AI

features.name: Resume Editor
features.description: Rich text editor with TipTap for editing resume sections, drag-and-drop reordering, and real-time preview

features.name: Template System
features.description: Multiple ATS-friendly resume templates with color themes and customization options

features.name: ATS Analyzer
features.description: AI-powered ATS score calculation, keyword matching, and resume optimization suggestions

features.name: Job Search & Matching
features.description: Search jobs, match resumes to job descriptions using ML, and get compatibility scores

features.name: GitHub Profile Import
features.description: Import user profile, projects, and contributions from GitHub to auto-populate resume

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: View all saved resumes, manage resume versions, delete resumes, and access quick actions

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin panel with user management, AI analytics, contact messages, feedback, logs, and settings

features.name: Contact & Feedback System
features.description: Contact form for user inquiries and feedback submission system

features.name: Dark Mode
features.description: Global dark mode toggle with persistent theme preference

features.name: Navigation Blocker
features.description: Prevent accidental navigation when user has unsaved changes in editor

features.name: Security Middleware
features.description: Rate limiting, helmet security headers, CORS, XSS protection, and data sanitization

features.name: AI Usage Tracking
features.description: Track and monitor AI API usage, quota management, and analytics

features.name: ML Job Classification
features.description: Machine learning service for resume classification and job matching using scikit-learn

features.name: PDF Export
features.description: Export resume to ATS-friendly PDF format with print optimization

features.name: Responsive Layout
features.description: Mobile-responsive navigation, header, footer, and layout components

features.name: API Services
features.description: Centralized API client with axios for all backend communication

features.name: Database Models
features.description: Mongoose schemas for User, Resume, Template, Contact, Feedback, AI Usage, and Admin Logs

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions for validation, email sending, and data processing
